item.title: How to: Ingest Splunk alert data to Microsoft Sentinel SIEM
item.description: Thanks to Javier Soriano, Principal Product Manager - OneSOC Customer Experience Engineering, for the peer review Introduction Although the recommended approach is to not have multiple SIEM solutions in place, many organizations are still running dual-SIEM setups, sometimes even introducing additional ones in the mix. Combination most often seen is running a legacy solution and pairing it with modern SIEM solutions like Microsoft Sentinel SIEM. Side-by-side architecture is recommended for just long enough to complete the migration, train people and update processes - but organizations might st...
